keyMoments.title: Haredas Debut
keyMoments.description: Haredas discovers the unconscious Nami outside his house on Weatheria after she was sent flying by Bartholomew Kuma. He takes her in and nurses her back to health.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Nami's future mentor who will teach her weather manipulation during the two-year timeskip.
keyMoments.quote: You've been sleeping for two days since you landed on this island.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Wind Knots
keyMoments.description: Haredas demonstrates Wind Knots to Nami, showing how the tied ropes can generate increasingly powerful wind gusts when untied.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a key weather manipulation technology that Nami will later master and incorporate into her fighting style.

keyMoments.title: Impressed by Nami's Natural Talent
keyMoments.description: Haredas is deeply impressed when Nami successfully uses the Wind Knots with her Clima-Tact to disperse a dangerous cyclone threatening Weatheria.
keyMoments.significance: Recognizes Nami's potential as a weather manipulator, setting up their future mentor-student relationship.

abilities.description: Expert knowledge of weather science and ability to manipulate weather conditions using Weatheria's technology.
Can use special tied ropes that release wind when untied, with each successive knot creating more powerful gusts.

relationships.description: Haredas rescues Nami and will become her mentor in weather science during the timeskip.

evolutionMoments.description: Haredas finds Nami unconscious and takes her in, beginning their relationship.

reveals.information: Born on the sky island Birka 97 years ago

keyMoments.title: Kitton and Taroimo Debut
keyMoments.description: Kitton discovers the crashed Franky in a snowy field on Karakuri Island, initially approaching with caution and pointing a gun at the stranger before his grandfather intervenes.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a resident of Karakuri Island who will help Franky and grant him access to Vegapunk's laboratory.

keyMoments.title: Takes Franky In
keyMoments.description: Kitton and his grandfather decide to help the injured Franky, carrying him back to their mechanical igloo home and nursing him back to health.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kitton's kind nature and willingness to help strangers despite initial caution.

relationships.description: Kitton and his family rescue Franky and help him during his time on Karakuri Island.

evolutionMoments.description: Kitton discovers Franky and takes him in with his grandfather.

relationships.description: Taroimo is Kitton's pet cyborg dog.

reveals.information: Lives on Karakuri Island with his grandfather

keyMoments.title: Taroimo Debut
keyMoments.description: Taroimo, Kitton's cyborg dog companion, appears when Kitton discovers Franky crashed in the snow on Karakuri Island.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the numbered cyborg dog (#28) from Karakuri Island.

abilities.description: Taroimo is a cyborg dog with mechanical modifications, numbered 28.

relationships.description: Taroimo is Kitton's loyal pet cyborg dog.

keyMoments.title: Lands on Weatheria
keyMoments.description: Nami crash-lands on the sky island Weatheria after being sent flying by Bartholomew Kuma, beginning her journey toward mastering advanced weather manipulation.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Nami's two-year training arc on Weatheria.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Wind Knots with Clima-Tact
keyMoments.description: Nami combines Wind Knots with her Perfect Clima-Tact to successfully disperse a massive cyclone threatening Weatheria, impressing Haredas with her natural talent.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Nami's ability to combine Weatheria's technology with her own weapons, foreshadowing her future power-ups.

abilities.description: Uses special tied ropes from Weatheria that release wind when untied, incorporated with her Clima-Tact.
Combines Wind Knots with Perfect Clima-Tact to disperse or create powerful cyclones.

relationships.description: Haredas becomes Nami's mentor in weather science on Weatheria.

evolutionMoments.description: Nami meets Haredas after he rescues her on Weatheria.

reveals.information: Shows natural talent for weather manipulation using Weatheria's Wind Knots

keyMoments.title: Arrives on Karakuri Island
keyMoments.description: Franky crash-lands on Karakuri Island, the birthplace of Dr. Vegapunk, where he will discover advanced technology that leads to his upgrades.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Franky's location for the timeskip training, connecting him to Vegapunk's legacy.

keyMoments.title: Personality Change with Tea
keyMoments.description: When given tea instead of cola, Franky undergoes a dramatic personality shift, becoming polite and refined instead of his usual brash self.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Franky's fuel source affects his personality, a recurring comedic element of his character.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Vegapunk's Laboratory
keyMoments.description: Franky learns about Dr. Vegapunk's abandoned laboratory on Karakuri Island, containing advanced technology and experiments.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Franky's access to Vegapunk's technology which will enable his post-timeskip upgrades.

relationships.description: Kitton and his family rescue and help Franky on Karakuri Island.

evolutionMoments.description: Kitton discovers Franky and takes him in with his grandfather.
